GSD.product_version: versions from v5.5 to before v5.18.8
GSD.description:
ice: ethtool: Prohibit improper channel config for DCB

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.8 by commit 4520c4bf4dca7aa285f30cb1ca8c08c531bbf0e9, it was introduced in version v5.5 by commit 87324e747fde7693620f6d4c74aa11b7551e096d. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ice: ethtool: Prohibit improper channel config for DCB
